CustomField.formula: IF( AND(Work_Order__r.Record_Type_Name__c = 'Fit For Duty', TEXT(Work_Order__r.Fit_For_Duty_Response__c) ='No'), 'FAILED: ', CASE(Work_Order_Status__c , "In Progress", "IN PROGRESS: ", "On Hold", "ON HOLD: ", "Completed", "COMPLETED: ", "Cannot Complete", "CANNOT COMPLETE: ", "Cancelled", "CANCELLED: ", "")) + Subject
CustomField.label: Subject with WO Status
